mapper.delete: delete from board where bno = #{bno} and writer=#{writer}
mapper.insert: insert into board (title, content, writer) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.sql: select bno, title, content, writer, view_cnt, comment_cnt, reg_date from board
mapper.select: order by reg_date DESC, bno DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pagesize}
